com.android.nfc_extras

Class NfcAdapterExtras

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.nfc_extras.NfcAdapterExtras

  • public final class NfcAdapterExtras
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides additional methods on an NfcAdapter for Card Emulation and management of NfcExecutionEnvironment's. There is a 1-1 relationship between an NfcAdapterExtras object and a NfcAdapter object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NfcAdapterExtras.CardEmulationRoute
      Immutable data class that describes a card emulation route.

    • Field Summary

      Broadcast Action: an RF field OFF has been detected.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_RF_FIELD_ON_DETECTED
      Broadcast Action: an RF field ON has been detected.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_RF_FIELD_ON_DETECTED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_RF_FIELD_ON_DETECTED
        Broadcast Action: an RF field ON has been detected.

        This is an unreliable signal, and will be removed.

        Requires the android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission to receive.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_RF_FIELD_OFF_DETECTED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_RF_FIELD_OFF_DETECTED
        Broadcast Action: an RF field OFF has been detected.

        This is an unreliable signal, and will be removed.

        Requires the android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission to receive.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static NfcAdapterExtras get(android.nfc.NfcAdapter adapter)
        Get the NfcAdapterExtras for the given NfcAdapter.

        Requires the android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission.

        Parameters:
        adapter - a NfcAdapter, must not be null
        Returns:
        the NfcAdapterExtras object for the given NfcAdapter

      • getCardEmulationRoute

        public NfcAdapterExtras.CardEmulationRoute getCardEmulationRoute()
        Get the routing state of this NFC EE.

        Requires the android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission.

      • setCardEmulationRoute

        public void setCardEmulationRoute(NfcAdapterExtras.CardEmulationRoute route)
        Set the routing state of this NFC EE.

        This routing state is not persisted across reboot.

        Requires the android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission.

        Parameters:
        route - a NfcAdapterExtras.CardEmulationRoute

      • getEmbeddedExecutionEnvironment

        public NfcExecutionEnvironment getEmbeddedExecutionEnvironment()
        Get the NfcExecutionEnvironment that is embedded with the NfcAdapter.

        Requires the android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission.

        Returns:
        a NfcExecutionEnvironment, or null if there is no embedded NFC-EE

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(byte[] token)
        Authenticate the client application. Some implementations of NFC Adapter Extras may require applications to authenticate with a token, before using other methods.
        Parameters:
        token - a implementation specific token
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if authentication failed

      • getDriverName

        public java.lang.String getDriverName()
        Returns the name of this adapter's driver.

        Different NFC adapters may use different drivers. This value is informational and should not be parsed.

        Returns:
        the driver name, or empty string if unknown
